leveraging advanced computational algorithmsbrbrApplies the tools of modern data science using open source architecture to the analysis of CBREs proprietary databrbrSupports data research efforts for multiple data sourcesbrbrDevelop data structures and pipelines to organize collect cleanse and standardize data that helps to generate insightsbrbrEvaluates new data sources data processing tools and communications softwarebrbrstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongTo perform this job successfully an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge skill andor ability requiredbrbrReasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functionsbrbrstronguEDUCATION And EXPERIENCEbrbrustrongBachelors or Masters in disciplines such as Mathematics Pure Applied Statistics Computer Science Engineering Information Systems or any other Scientific discipline is ideal But
